member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture
member.summary: Represents an operator that generates a sequence of buffered samples acquired from the specified audio capture device.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the capture device from which to acquire samples.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate used by the audio capture device, in Hz.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.Frequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate used by the audio capture device, in Hz.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.FrequencySpecified
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property should be serialized.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.SampleFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of capture buffer samples.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.BufferLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the capture buffer, in milliseconds.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioCapture.Generate
member.summary: Generates an observable sequence of buffered audio samples acquired from the specified audio capture device.
member.returns: A sequence of objects representing audio capture buffers of a fixed length. See .

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextConfiguration
member.summary: Represents the configuration of

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextConfiguration.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets the name of the output device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextConfiguration.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets the sample rate, in Hz, used by the output device.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextConfiguration.Refresh
member.summary: Gets the refresh frequency, in Hz, used by the output device.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextConfigurationCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of audio context configuration settings.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextManager
member.summary: Manages the lifetime of an audio context and its associated resources.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextManager.AudioContext
member.summary: Gets the audio context associated with any loaded audio resources.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextManager.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gets the resource manager storing all the resources associated with this audio context.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextManager.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the class.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback
member.summary: Represents an operator that plays a sequence of buffered samples to the specified audio device.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.SourceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional name of the source used to playback the audio buffers.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate, in Hz, used to playback the audio buffers.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.Frequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate, in Hz, used to playback the audio buffers.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.FrequencySpecified
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property should be serialized.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.State
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the state to which the source should be set when queueing audio buffers.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.Process(System.IObservable{OpenCV.Net.Mat})
member.summary: Plays an observable sequence of buffered samples to the specified audio device.
member.param: A sequence of objects representing the buffered audio samples to queue for playback on the specified audio device.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of queueing the audio buffers for playback on the specified audio device.
member.remarks: This operator only subscribes to the sequence after initializing the audio context on the specified audio device.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.Process(System.IObservable{OpenCV.Net.Mat},System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource})
member.summary: Plays an observable sequence of buffered samples to all the specified audio sources.
member.param: A sequence of objects representing the buffered audio samples to queue for playback on all the active audio sources.
A sequence of objects on which to queue the buffered audio samples for playback.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of queueing the audio buffers for playback on all the active audio sources.
member.remarks: This operator only subscribes to the sequence after initializing the audio context on the specified audio device.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioPlayback.Process(System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource},System.IObservable{OpenCV.Net.Mat})
member.summary: Plays an observable sequence of buffered samples to all the specified audio sources.
member.param: A sequence of objects on which to queue the buffered audio samples for playback.
A sequence of objects representing the buffered audio samples to queue for playback on all the active audio sources.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of queueing the audio buffers for playback on all the active audio sources.
member.remarks: This operator only subscribes to the sequence after initializing the audio context on the specified audio device.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader
member.summary: Represents an operator that generates a sequence of buffered audio samples from an uncompressed RIFF/WAV file.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the WAV file.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader.BufferLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the sample buffer, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate, in Hz, used to playback the sample buffers. If it is zero, samples will be played at the rate specified in the RIFF/WAV file header.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader.Generate
member.summary: Generates a sequence of buffered audio samples from the specified WAV file.
member.returns: A sequence of objects representing audio sample buffers of a fixed length. See .

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioReader.Generate``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Generates a sequence of buffered audio samples from the specified WAV file, where each new buffer is emitted only when an observable sequence emits a notification.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence containing the notifications used for emitting audio buffers.
member.returns: A sequence of objects representing audio sample buffers of a fixed length. See .

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioResources
member.summary: Represents an operator that creates a collection of buffer resources and audio sources to be loaded into the resource manager.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioResources.Buffers
member.summary: Gets the collection of buffer resources to be loaded into the resource manager.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioResources.Sources
member.summary: Gets the collection of audio sources to be loaded into the resource manager.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioResources.Process(System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioContextManager})
member.summary: Creates a collection of buffer resources and audio sources to be loaded into the resource manager.
member.param: A sequence of objects containing the resource managers into which the resources will be loaded.
member.returns: A sequence of objects which can be used to load resources into the resource manager.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource
member.summary: Represents a source of spatialized audio which can be used to define and control the audio landscape surrounding the listener.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Id
member.summary: Gets the name of the audio source. This is an OpenAL buffer reference which can be used to call audio source manipulation functions.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume amplification applied to the audio source.
member.remarks: Each division by 2 equals an attenuation of -6 dB, and each multiplication by 2 an amplification by +6 dB. A value of 1.0 means the source is unchanged, and zero is interpreted as zero volume.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch to be applied to the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Relative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source uses coordinates relative to the listener.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Looping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source is looping.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction vector of the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.State
member.summary: Gets information about the current source state.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Rewind
member.summary: Stops the source and sets its state to .

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Play
member.summary: Plays, replays, or resumes the source and sets its state to . If the source is already playing, the source will restart at the beginning.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the source and sets its state to .

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Stop
member.summary: Stops the source and sets its state to .

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the class.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.AudioWriter
member.summary: Represents an operator that writes a sequence of buffered samples into an uncompressed RIFF/WAV file.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioWriter.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate of the input signal, in Hz.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioWriter.SamplingFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate of the input signal, in Hz.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.AudioWriter.SamplingFrequencySpecified
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property should be serialized.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.AudioWriter.Write(Bonsai.Audio.RiffWriter,OpenCV.Net.Mat)
member.summary: Writes a sample buffer into the WAV file.
member.param: The used to write data into the WAV file.
A object containing the audio samples to write into the file.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Buffer
member.summary: Represents an audio buffer which can be used to store and manipulate audio data.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.Buffer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Buffer.Id
member.summary: Gets the name of the buffer. This is an OpenAL buffer reference which can be used to call audio manipulation functions.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.Buffer.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the class.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.BufferConfiguration
member.summary: Provides configuration and loading functionality for audio buffer resources.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.BufferConfiguration.CreateResource(Bonsai.Resources.ResourceManager)
member.summary: Creates a new empty audio buffer resource, typically used for uploading dynamic data.
member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.BufferConfigurationCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of audio buffer resources.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SoundBuffer
member.summary: Provides configuration and loading functionality for WAV audio buffers.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SoundBuffer.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the sound WAV file.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SoundBuffer.CreateResource(Bonsai.Resources.ResourceManager)
member.summary: Creates a new buffer resource by reading and storing audio data from a WAV file.
member.returns: A new instance of the class storing audio data from the loaded WAV file.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration
member.summary: Provides configuration and loading functionality for audio sources.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.BufferName
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional name of a buffer to play when creating the source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume amplification applied to the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch to be applied to the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction vector of the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Looping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source is looping.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.Relative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source uses coordinates relative to the listener.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.State
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the state to which the source should be set after creation.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.CreateResource(Bonsai.Resources.ResourceManager)
member.summary: Creates a new source of spatialized audio.
member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.Configuration.SourceConfigurationCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of audio source resources.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext
member.summary: Represents an operator that creates an audio context using the specified device and listener properties.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate, in Hz, used by the audio device. Zero represents the driver default.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Refresh
member.summary: Gets or sets the refresh frequency, in Hz, used by the audio device. Zero represents the driver default.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the listener, in the world coordinate frame.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity of the listener, in the world coordinate frame.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction vector of the listener, in the world coordinate frame.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Up
member.summary: Gets or sets the up vector of the listener, in the world coordinate frame.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of amplification applied to the listener. Each multiplication by 2 increases gain by +6dB.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.CreateAudioContext.Generate
member.summary: Generates an observable sequence that contains the audio context manager object.
member.returns: A sequence containing a single instance of the class which will manage the lifetime of the audio context.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that creates a spatialized source on the specified audio device.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.BufferName
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional name of a buffer to play when creating the source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume amplification applied to the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch to be applied to the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction vector of the audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current location of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the current velocity of the audio source in three-dimensional space.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Looping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source is looping.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Relative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio source uses coordinates relative to the listener.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.State
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the state to which the source should be set after creation.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.CreateSource.Generate
member.summary: Generates an observable sequence that contains the created audio source.
member.returns: A sequence containing the created instance.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.PauseSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that pauses the specified set of audio sources.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.PlaySource
member.summary: Represents an operator that starts playing the specified set of audio sources. If a source is already playing, it will start from the beginning.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.RewindSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that rewinds the specified set of audio sources back to the initial state.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.RiffWriter
member.summary: Writes audio data into a stream following the RIFF/WAV format.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.RiffWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified stream, number of channels, sample rate and bits per sample.
member.param: The output stream.
The number of audio channels.
The playback sample frequency, in samples per second.
The number of bits per audio sample.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.RiffWriter.Write(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes an array containing raw audio data into the WAV stream.
member.param: A array containing the data to write.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.RiffWriter.Close
member.summary: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.StopSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that stops the specified set of audio sources.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateBuffer
member.summary: Represents an operator that updates the sample data of the specified audio buffer.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateBuffer.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateBuffer.BufferName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the buffer to update.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateBuffer.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sample rate, in Hz, used to playback the buffer data.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateBuffer.Process(System.IObservable{OpenCV.Net.Mat})
member.summary: Updates the data of the specified audio buffer using an observable sequence of buffered samples.
member.param: A sequence of objects representing the samples used to fill the buffer with audio data.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of filling the buffer with audio data.
member.remarks: This operator only subscribes to the sequence after initializing the audio context on the specified audio device.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener
member.summary: Represents an operator that updates the properties of the audio listener.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current location of the listener, in the world coordinate frame. If this property is not set, the location of the audio listener will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the current velocity of the listener, in the world coordinate frame. If this property is not set, the velocity of the audio listener will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current orientation of the listener, in the world coordinate frame. If this property is not set, the orientation of the audio listener will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of amplification applied to the listener. Each multiplication by 2 increases gain by +6dB. If this property is not set, the gain of the audio listener will not be updated.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateListener.Process``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Updates the properties of the audio listener whenever the source sequence emits a notification.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence containing the notifications used to trigger the update of the audio listener.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the properties of the audio listener whenever the sequence emits a notification.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that updates the properties of an audio source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.SourceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio source to update.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Gain
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume amplification applied to the audio source. If this property is not set, the gain of the audio source will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch to be applied to the audio source. If this property is not set, the pitch of the audio source will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current location of the audio source in three-dimensional space. If this property is not set, the location of the audio source will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the current velocity of the audio source in three-dimensional space. If this property is not set, the velocity of the audio source will not be updated.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the current direction vector of the audio source. If this property is not set, the direction of the audio source will not be updated.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Process``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Updates the properties of the specified audio source whenever the source sequence emits a notification.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence containing the notifications used to trigger the update of the audio source.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the properties of the specified audio source whenever the sequence emits a notification.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSource.Process(System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource})
member.summary: Updates the properties of all the audio sources in an observable sequence.
member.param: A sequence of objects whose properties should be updated.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the properties of each of the audio sources in the sequence.
member.remarks: If is not null or empty, this method behaves as .

member.name: T:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState
member.summary: Provides an abstract base class for operators that update the state of specified audio sources.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio device used for playback.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState.SourceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the audio source, or a comma-separated list of names if specifying multiple sources.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState.Process``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Updates the state of the specified audio source whenever the source sequence emits a notification.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence containing the notifications used to trigger the update of the audio source.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the state of the specified audio source whenever the sequence emits a notification.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState.Process(System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource})
member.summary: Updates the state of all the audio sources in an observable sequence.
member.param: A sequence of objects whose state should be updated.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the state of each of the audio sources in the sequence.
member.remarks: If is not null or empty, this method behaves as .

member.name: M:Bonsai.Audio.UpdateSourceState.Process(System.IObservable{Bonsai.Audio.AudioSource[]})
member.summary: Updates the state of all the audio sources in an observable sequence.
member.param: A sequence of arrays containing all the audio sources whose state should be updated.
member.returns: An observable sequence that is identical to the sequence but where there is an additional side effect of updating the state of all the audio sources.
member.remarks: If is not null or empty, this method behaves as .
